opinion.post: If I might add a comment of another sort. In Mel Gibson’s movie about the Passion, Jesus suffers a severe shoulder lesion. That wasn’t just artistic license on the part of Gibson- It was taken from the claimed visions about the Passion of Catherine Emmerich. According to Emmerich, the worst and most painful wound that Jesus suffered, of myriad, was that shoulder sprain or dislocation. If you believe it, that could explain the misaligned shoulders on the shroud.
opinion.title: Comment Promoted:  A Misalignment Between the Left and Right Shoulders
